title: Did Muslims Attack ‘Hindu’ Siblings in UP For Resisting Rape?
subtitle: A video which shows a profusely bleeding man and woman appealing the police to file an FIR against the accused has gone viral with users claiming that the two in the video are Hindu brother and sister who were thrashed by Muslims for resisting rape.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video which shows a profusely bleeding man and woman appealing the police to file an FIR has gone viral on social media with users claiming that the two in the video are Hindu siblings who were thrashed by Muslims for resisting rape.

The text accompanying the video reads, “This incident happened in Itaunja in Lucknow. Four to five people belonging to the peaceful community of Islam roughed up this brother-sister duo after these men tried to rape the girl and the brother resisted. Wake up, Hindus, your end is near.”
